name: radar_client
description: Realtime apps with a high level API based on engine.io
author: Mikito Takada <mikito.takada@gmail.com>

scripts.check-clean: if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != "" ]]; then npm run warn-dirty-tree && exit 1; fi
scripts.check-modules: if [ -z "$SKIP_PACKAGE_CHECK" ] && [ ./package.json -nt ./node_modules ]; then npm run warn-outdated && exit 1; else rm -rf ./node_modules/sfsm/demo; fi
scripts.warn-outdated: echo 'Your node_modules are out of date. Please run "rm -rf node_modules && npm install" in order to ensure you have the latest dependencies.'
scripts.test: ls ./tests/*.test.js | xargs -n 1 -t -I {} sh -c 'TEST="{}" npm run test-one'
scripts.build: npm run version-build; ./node_modules/gluejs/bin/gluejs --include ./lib --npm microee,sfsm --replace engine.io-client=eio,minilog=Minilog --global RadarClient --main lib/index.js --out dist/radar_client.js
